tweet: Happy #SmallBusinessSaturday! Make sure to stay warm and #shopsmall. By buying local, you’re supporting the small business owners who make up the heart of Rhode Island’s economy. pic.twitter.com/cwsI1jICZ0

Don’t forget to #ShopSmall tomorrow for #SmallBusinessSaturday. When you support one of our local establishments, you support Rhode Island’s economy and the entrepreneurs who directly contribute to it. pic.twitter.com/ofbsujLbBC

This Thanksgiving, I’m incredibly thankful to the Rhode Islanders who devote themselves to spreading kindness and compassion every day to make our state a better place for all. Wishing you and your loved ones a peaceful and joyous break as you gather in celebration this holiday.

The @usedgov #RISE Award spotlights classified school employees who have made outstanding contributions to quality education in the U.S. If you know a Rhode Islander who exemplifies this, nominate them!  https://www2.ed.gov/programs/rise/index.html …

Travel this holiday season is expected to hit historic highs & the safety of passengers should be our top priority. A person’s chance of survival during an opioid overdose should not depend on the airline they choose.
